main.java.questfortheabodeth.powerups

Class DamagePlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.java.questfortheabodeth.powerups.Pickup
        • main.java.questfortheabodeth.powerups.DamagePlus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Collidable, Powerup, org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable 

    public class DamagePlus
extends Pickup
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A pickup that increases the amount of damage the player does for a set amount of time. Once this is picked up a new thread is created with the sole function of sleeping and calling the removeBuff function.
    See Also:
    Thread, Runnable

      • run

        public void run()
        ONce the player has pickup up this powerup this runnable runs in a newly created thread. It sleeps for a set amount of time and then removes the increased damage
